=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: St. Ives Gentle Face Cleansing Wipes for Dry and Sensitive Skin - 35 Wipes x 2 Pack
Review Date: 2020/02/07
Store: St. Ives
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'St. Ives', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.89 x 5.08 x 3.86 inches; 14.92 Ounces'}

Review Title: one of best wipes Ive ever used

De Luxe Shampoo and Conditioner Rosemary Mint 14 Ounces Each

{'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'M&T HEALTH', 'Special Ingredients': 'Rosemary', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Unit Count': '12.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.3 x 4.7 x 2.1 inches; 14 Ounces', 'UPC': '763109536183 794437494968 796433632658 639939994946'}

One With Nature Dead Sea Mineral Soap Goat's Milk & Lavender-4 Oz
One With Nature
{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'One With Nature', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Item Weight': '4 Ounces'}
Lovely fragrance and lasts long compared to other green brands
delicate scent
CAFE AU LAIT Vegetable Glycerin Bar Soap
Primal Elements
["Rich, creamy coffee aroma blended with real coffee grinds to remove cooking odors from busy chef's hands. HIGHLY MOISTURIZING - Glycerin is a humectant, attracting moisture and draws it deep into your skin to keep it hydrated. With over 25% glycerin in our soap, our soap moisturizes the skin with a rich lather that rinses cleanly away leaving the skin silky smooth. GREAT FOR FACE & BODY – When used as a face wash, glycerin soap will remove the excess oil from the skin to unclog pores. Unlike regular soaps, which dry out the skin and make it feel tight and flaky, our glycerin soaps keep the skin hydrated after use. HIGH QUALITY INGREDIENTS – Paraben Free, Cruelty Free and Vegan. Made in California, USA. GREAT FOR GIFTS - Each 5.8 oz. bar is shrink-wrapped and great for gift giving."]
{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Primal Elements', 'Scent': 'Coffee', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 2.99 x 0.51 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SWCAFE', 'UPC': '640986102925'}
Had bad experiences with glycerin soap in the past so was wary when trying this brand. However texture and fragrance exceeded expectations. Even though cupcake part falls out easily ... cant wait to try other "flavors"
delicious scent and gentle enough for face
Too Faced Primed & Peachy Cooling Matte Perfecting Primer, 40 mL / 1.35 Fl.Oz.
Too Faced
["Cooling matte primer blurs and smooths your complexion with a brightening peach tint that works on any skin tone. Wear alone of under foundation for a mattifying soft-focus finish that's lightweight, comfortable, and long lasting."]
{'Brand': 'Too Faced', 'Product Benefits': 'Brightening', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Item Volume': '40 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1 x 1 x 4 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '651986702275'}
Tried this in the store and liked the smooth texture and peachy color but I use green products like Korres now
no toxic smell
365 Everyday Value, Baby Foaming Wash, 10 Fl Oz
365
{'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': '365', 'Material Feature': 'Dermatologist Tested', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Baby', 'Package Dimensions': '7.6 x 2.99 x 1.89 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': '171678'}
Gentler than many liquid hand soaps ... thats what Im using it for
good quality
OKAY | Black Jamaican Castor Oil Conditioner | For All Hair Types & Textures | Revive - Moisturize - Grow Healthy Hair | with Argan Oil & Shea Butter | Free Of Parabens, Silicones, Sulfates | 12 Oz
Okay
['Stronger richer fuller hair growth needs to be properly conditioned to prevent breakage and stimulate growth. Moisture Growth Conditioner with Black Jamaican Castor Oil and Argan Oil will help hair become comparably softer and detangles brittle hair with rich hydrating ingredients. This conditioner should be used every day after shampooing. This is the 2nd step which provides conditioning therapy to help revive brittle hair.']
{'Brand': 'Okay', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.25 x 8 x 2.25 inches; 12.52 Ounces', 'Item model number': '810367016336', 'UPC': '810367016336', 'Manufacturer': 'Derby International LLC, dba KANAR', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Domestic Shipping': 'Item can be shipped within U.S.', 'International Shipping': 'This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.  Learn More'}
I have dry hair due to washing in warm water. This conditioner adds glossiness without weight
richly scented and no artificial dye

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to focus on health-conscious personal care and cosmetics, now marked by a positive experience with sensitive-skin targeted products, reflecting an interest in gentle, effective options that align with both personal and family needs.

- **Quality Over Cost:** They maintain a clear emphasis on high-quality, non-toxic, eco-friendly items crafted from natural ingredients, reinforcing their preference for sustainable and health-focused products.

- **Scent and Performance:** The user's preference for non-scented products has been validated through their recent finding of effective, irritation-free options, highlighting a commitment to sensory-friendly choices, especially important for family health.

- **Comparison Habits:** Their methodical approach to product comparisons continues, as evidenced by their past skepticism towards certain brands—now countered by recent positive experiences that inform their purchasing decisions.

- **Environmental/Health Consideration:** The ongoing commitment to avoiding synthetic and harmful ingredients is evident, as they explore products that cater to sensitive skin without compromising their values on health and environmental responsibility.

- **Beauty Awareness:** The user's awareness of multifunctional and skin-friendly products is emphasized through their recent purchase, showcasing their dedication to a holistic approach that enhances overall wellness for themselves and their family.

Overall, the user exemplifies a steadfast commitment to high-quality, eco-friendly personal care, combining informed, thoughtful purchasing habits with a focus on individual and family well-being.
